resources.string:
This app is meant to map the coverage of TTN gateways. It will monitor packets received from a node, plotting the location of the packets on a map. The signal strength is indicated by a colour, creating a heatmap of the coverage.


This app will use your phone's GPS to determine the location where a packet was sent from. The LoRa node therefore needs to be as close as possible to your smartphone.


Enter your LoRa device address below, and then tap on start.
